a = readline()

println('Enter the base(10,8,16,2)')

println('Entered base: ', base)

println(parse(Int64, a, parse(Int64,base)))
print(typeof(parse(Int64, a, parse(Int64,base))))

quotes.source: geeksforgeeks - Find maximum element along with its index in Julia - findmax() Method

quotes.text:
using Primes

function divisors(n)

	d = Int64[1]

	for (p,e) in factor(n)
		t = Int64[]
		r = 1

		for i in 1:e
			r *= p
			for u in d
				push!(t, u*r)
			end
		end
		append!(d, t)
	end

	return sort(d)
end
println(divisors(5040))
